message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe you'd find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $120. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $95 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I appreciate you recognizing the value. How about we meet in the middle at $105? It's a fair deal for a product of this quality.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still not able to go above $95 for this product. I hope you can accommodate my budget.
